title: Aho's outstanding hat trick | NHL.com
text: PHI@CAR: Aho picks up his first career hat trick Jan 31, 2017 • 01:12 PHI@CAR: Mason stones McGinn's wide-open shot Jan 31, 2017 • 00:13 PHI@CAR: Aho uses nifty move to beat Mason Jan 31, 2017 • 00:56 PHI@CAR: Ward robs Raffl with a sprawling save Jan 31, 2017 • 00:18 PHI@CAR: Aho buries one-timer for his second tally Jan 31, 2017 • 01:03 PHI@CAR: Ward flashes the leather on MacDonald Jan 31, 2017 • 00:36 PHI@CAR: Skinner zips a wrist shot past Mason Jan 31, 2017 • 00:56 PHI@CAR: Aho rips top-shelf PPG, nets hat trick Jan 31, 2017 • 01:21 PHI@CAR: Faulk buries blistering slap shot Jan 31, 2017 • 00:52 PHI@CAR: Schenn nets his 100th career goal Jan 31, 2017 • 00:44
